successes.title: Twilight Struggle Digital Edition
successes.description: Now is your chance to help GMT bring Twilight Struggle out for PC, Mac, Linux, iOS, and Android!

Pledges.description: Our sincerest gratitude for your support!
Digital copy of the game for Android, online beta access on Android, and a Kickstarter-Exclusive alternate in-game map to use to play with.

Previous rewards except now you can choose to own your digital copy of Twilight Struggle for either iOS or Android, plus a digital set of the promo card pack, and a digital copy of the "Twilight Struggle: What If?" expansion.

***Digital PC Tier*** Digital copy of Twilight Struggle, expansion, promo pack, and the Kickstarter-Exclusive alternate in-game map for PC, Mac, or Linux. (NOTE: This tier and its rewards ONLY APPLY AT THIS LEVEL and are not included in another other tier)

Previous rewards except now you can choose to own your digital copy of Twilight Struggle for either PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android, online beta access now available for either Android or PC, receive a Kickstarter-Exclusive in-game skin for your digital copy of the game, a physical copy of the promo card pack with Kickstarter-Exclusive Artwork, digital promo pack will now also have the Kickstarter-Exclusive Artwork, and a physical copy of the "Twilight Struggle: What If?" expansion with Kickstarter-Exclusive Artwork (artwork will also be used for your digital expansion as well).

***Digital Sony Tier*** Digital copy of Twilight Struggle, expansion, promo pack, and Kickstarter-Exclusive alternate in-game map for PS4 or PS Vita. (NOTE: This tier and its rewards ONLY APPLY AT THIS LEVEL and are not included in another other tier)

***Early-Bird $75 Reward*** Previous rewards plus a physical copy of the "Twilight Struggle Deluxe Edition" board game, entry into a backer-only online tournament with GMT-sponsored prizes, and 6 months of free tournament entries (up to 10 entries per month).

***2nd Early-Bird $75 Reward*** Previous rewards plus a physical copy of the "Twilight Struggle Deluxe Edition" board game, entry into a backer-only online tournament with GMT-sponsored prizes, and 6 months of free tournament entries (up to 10 entries per month).

Previous rewards plus a physical copy of the "Twilight Struggle Deluxe Edition" board game, entry into a backer-only online tournament with GMT-sponsored prizes, and 6 months of free online tournament entries (up to 10 entries per month).

***Early-Bird $150 Reward*** Previous rewards plus a signed Limited-Edition Collector's Boxed Edition of "Twilight Struggle", a backer-only online tournament with the Twilight Struggle Design and Development team with GMT-sponsored prizes, 1 year of free online tournament entries (up to 10 entries per month), and a Kickstarter-exclusive personalized in-game avatar for your digital copy of "Twilight Struggle".

***2nd Early-Bird $150 Reward*** Previous rewards plus a signed Limited-Edition Collector's Boxed Edition of "Twilight Struggle", a backer-only online tournament with the Twilight Struggle Design and Development team with GMT-sponsored prizes, 1 year of free online tournament entries (up to 10 entries per month), and a Kickstarter-exclusive personalized in-game avatar for your digital copy of "Twilight Struggle".

***LAST CHANCE Early-Bird $150 Reward*** Previous rewards plus a signed Limited-Edition Collector's Boxed Edition of "Twilight Struggle", a backer-only online tournament with the Twilight Struggle Design and Development team with GMT-sponsored prizes, 1 year of free online tournament entries (up to 10 entries per month), and a Kickstarter-exclusive personalized in-game avatar for your digital copy of "Twilight Struggle".

Previous rewards plus a signed Limited-Edition Collector's Boxed Edition of "Twilight Struggle", a backer-only online tournament with the Twilight StruggleDevelopment team members with GMT-sponsored prizes, 1 year of free online tournament entries (up to 10 entries per month), and a Kickstarter-exclusive personalized in-game avatar for your digital copy of "Twilight Struggle".

Previous rewards plus a ticket to the Origins Game Fair in 2015, dinner with Twilight Struggle Development team members, and accommodations for 1 night in a hotel of our choice. (accommodations for travel and any other nights spent in a hotel is the responsibility of the backer).

***Last chance for this tier!*** Previous rewards plus a ticket to the Origins Game Fair in 2015, dinner with Twilight Struggle Development team members, and accommodations for 1 night in a hotel of our choice. (accommodations for travel and any other nights spent in a hotel is the responsibility of the backer).
